page.title: 14CLUBS AND INSTITUTIONS
page.content: There are few clubs in Mathon;there is one in the Parish Hall_which used to host a womens institute_,this is a{ {badminton club}which takes place twice a week.There is also a {tennis club} which was started in 1980.They pay a peppercorn rent to Mr Phipps for the land on which the courts have been made. There was a football team till 1983 when it stopped due probably to the lack of players. There is no young farmers club and the scout group was disbanded a few years ago on the retirement of its leader.There are discos in the Hall from time to time.
